name: physical-ai-humanoid-robotics
description: Comprehensive educational book on Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

scripts.build:stats: npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js
scripts.serve:build: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.optimize:images: find static/img docs/assets -name "*.png" -exec pngquant --quality=65-80 --output {} --force {} \; && find static/img docs/assets -name "*.jpg" -exec jpegoptim --max=80 {} \;
scripts.clean: npm run clear && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.preflight: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:links && npm run build
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:links
scripts.prepare:deploy: npm run ci && npm run optimize:images
scripts.monitor:size: du -sh build/ && find build/ -name "*.js" -exec wc -c {} \; | sort -n
